text: Damian Howard Green (born 17 January 1956) is a British politician. He was First Secretary of State and Minister for the Cabinet Office from June to December 2017 in the Second May government. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He has been Member of Parliament (MP) for Ashford since 1997. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Berkshire Category:British Roman Catholics Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Welsh politicians
title: Damian Green
